attributes.action: Block efforts to bring in presumed consent to transplant surgery.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Ministry of Health report 'Organs for Transplants' tries to normalise Brain Stem Death to further their ambitions towards compulsory donation of body parts. Recommendation 10 of that report seeks to establish a policy of '... high quality organ removal from all HEARTBEATING and non-heartbeating donors.' That would be legalised murder. World War II was supposed to stop Hitler and his experiments. Please ensure that these ghoulish policies are stopped NOW.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
